statements: SELECT player_id, player_name, games_played, goals_scored, assists, tackles_made FROM player_statistics WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, games_played FROM player_statistics WHERE assists > 5 ORDER BY goals_scored DESC
SELECT * FROM player_statistics WHERE games_played <= 10 AND tackles_made > 5
SELECT player_name, tackles_made FROM player_statistics WHERE goals_scored BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT player_id, player_name, assists FROM player_statistics WHERE goals_scored >= 15
SELECT player_id, player_name, goals_scored FROM player_statistics WHERE games_played > 10 ORDER BY goals_scored DESC, assists ASC
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists, tackles_made FROM player_statistics WHERE goals_scored > 5 AND assists > 3 ORDER BY assists DESC, goals_scored ASC
SELECT player_name, games_played FROM player_statistics WHERE tackles_made > 20 ORDER BY games_played DESC
SELECT player_id, player_name, games_played, goals_scored, assists, tackles_made FROM player_statistics WHERE goals_scored = 0 OR assists = 0 ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT * FROM player_statistics WHERE games_played BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY player_id ASC
SELECT * FROM player_stats;
SELECT player_name, age, position FROM player_stats;
SELECT player_name, weight FROM player_stats WHERE age > 25;
SELECT player_name, height, position FROM player_stats ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT player_name, performance_metric, performance_score FROM player_stats JOIN performance_data ON player_stats.player_id = performance_data.player_id WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM player_stats WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY height DESC
SELECT player_name, age, position FROM player_stats WHERE weight BETWEEN 150.00 AND 200.00
SELECT player_name, height, weight FROM player_stats WHERE position = 'Forward' AND age < 30 ORDER BY player_name ASC

SELECT player_name, performance_metric, performance_score FROM player_stats JOIN performance_data ON player_stats.player_id = performance_data.player_id WHERE session_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY performance_score DESC
SELECT player_name, age, height, weight, position FROM player_stats WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND weight > 180.00 ORDER BY player_name
SELECT player_name, player_team, player_age FROM player_statistics;
SELECT player_name, player_height, player_weight FROM player_statistics ORDER BY player_age DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM player_statistics WHERE player_age > 25;
SELECT player_id, date_played, score FROM player_performance WHERE score > 80;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM player_achievements;
SELECT player_name, player_age, player_position FROM player_statistics WHERE player_team = 'Barcelona';
SELECT * FROM player_performance WHERE date_played >= '2022-01-01' AND date_played <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY score DESC;

SELECT player_name, player_position, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM player_statistics JOIN player_achievements ON player_statistics.player_id = player_achievements.player_id WHERE player_statistics.player_age < 25;

SELECT player_name, player_team, distance_covered FROM player_statistics JOIN player_performance ON player_statistics.player_id = player_performance.player_id WHERE player_age >= 30 AND duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY distance_covered DESC;
SELECT achievement_name, description FROM player_achievements WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100 ORDER BY achievement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_stats;
SELECT player_name, age, height FROM player_stats WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT player_name, date, focus_area FROM training_sessions WHERE duration > 60;
SELECT player_name, score, date_played FROM game_performance ORDER BY date_played DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, date_achieved FROM achievements WHERE player_id=1001;
SELECT * FROM player_stats ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT player_name, age, gender FROM player_stats WHERE age >= 25;
SELECT player_name, height, weight FROM player_stats WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT player_name, score, duration FROM player_stats JOIN game_performance ON player_stats.player_id = game_performance.player_id WHERE score > 100;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, date_achieved FROM player_stats JOIN achievements ON player_stats.player_id = achievements.player_id ORDER BY date_achieved DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_stats;
SELECT player_name, position FROM player_stats WHERE position = 'Forward';
SELECT player_name, height, weight FROM player_stats ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT team_name, coach_name, location FROM team_stats WHERE total_wins > 10;
SELECT player_name, performance_metric, metric_value FROM performance_tracking WHERE metric_value > 8.0 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT player_name, jersey_number, position FROM player_stats;
SELECT team_id, team_name, total_wins, total_losses FROM team_stats ORDER BY total_wins DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, height, weight FROM player_stats WHERE height > 6.0;
SELECT game_id, player_id, score, game_date FROM game_performance WHERE score > 20;
SELECT schedule_id, player_id, training_date, training_duration, training_type FROM training_schedule WHERE training_date >= '2022-01-01';
